summary.span: 代表包含加密封裝的 OLE 複合檔案 (Compound File)。

span.span: Represents an OLE compound file that contains an encrypted package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有沒有公用建構函式。 has no public constructors. 由使用靜態， ，或方法。An is created by use of the static , , or methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫完成時。Call when finished with a . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示會同時釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊並，請參閱 [清除設定未受管理的 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 取得權限 Managed 文件的核心封裝屬性 (例如 Title 和 Subject)。

span.span: Gets the core package properties (such as Title and Subject) of the rights managed document.
The for the package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這些核心屬性會儲存在標準 OLE 屬性資料流 （\005SummaryInformation 和 \005DocumentSummaryInformation）。These core properties are stored in the standard OLE property streams (\005SummaryInformation and \005DocumentSummaryInformation). 核心屬性也會儲存在封裝本身。The core properties are also stored in the package itself. 它是兩組屬性同步處理應用程式的責任。It is the responsibility of the application to keep the two sets of properties synchronized.
